overall_goal: Prepare and mix groundnuts into dough, then pour the mixture into a cupcake pan for baking.

clips.subgoal: Prepare the knife and workspace for chopping groundnuts.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Place phone on fridge and open shelf to retrieve the knife.
Move bowls and set items on the sink.
Open the tin, take groundnuts, and put them on the chopping board.

clips.subgoal: Chop the groundnuts into small pieces.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Prepare tin and cutting area, then chop groundnuts.
Complete the final chopping and cleaning up of knife.

clips.subgoal: Mix the chopped groundnuts into the dough.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Add groundnuts to dough and start mixing.
Continue and finish mixing the dough.

clips.subgoal: Prepare the cupcake pan and pour in the mixture.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Fetch and pour the mixture into the cupcake pan.
Shake the pan to align the mixture and finalize the preparation.
